name: unacknowledged
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not accepted, admitted, or recognized: Her contibution to the field of astronomy often goes unacknowledged. Workers can feel unacknowledged in a large organization.
If a message or gift is unacknowledged, the person who received it does not tell the person who sent it that it has arrived: Both of my letters have gone unacknowledged. A month after he sent it, his appeal to the directors remained unanswered and unacknowledged. Related word
acknowledge
More examplesFewer examplesA lot of the work that they do is unacknowledged and unpaid.He sat alone, unacknowledged by the other members of his family.His request for increased funding went unacknowledged.
